Text: Just a thought, no matter how good the cam is, this is Oscar hype season so almost every movie will see dvd screeners very quickly, some even before they hit the theaters. I'm gonna check this out because I am a Denzel and Tony Scott fanatic, but the dvd screener will probably appear in the next week.

im not questioning you, but what makes u so sure, ive been waitin on despicable me for months. but there has been alot of screeners lately

I hope there is soon a screener for Skyline.  Even though someone else said that the movie was not directed well and the story had too much fuzz in it, I still think it'll be a good movie if the viewer can understand the concept.
Ok guys - can we have some info as to the quality of this download!!!???
What do you really expect from a CAM ??
look at the file size pretty high quality from the screen shots but hows the audio?

Excellent quality for a cam version. The video is not quite as smooth as a DVD rip, but you can always tell what is taking place. The audio is louder than usual for a cam rip, with a little distortion during the really loud action moments, but it holds up well. Very watchable copy! Thanks to the uploader!
